channel.title: collapsing Whonix-Debian with removing one program (careful)
channel.description:
if u decided to remove imagemagic from Whonix or Debian inside Qubes = **DONT do it** .
because the VM wont start-up again (specially if the VM is standalone).
why this happening ? because there is a shared dependency between imagemagic and Qubes OS.
read more here:-
https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/1735

Issue: Domain Debian qrexec not connected

opened by TNTBOMBOM on 2016-02-10
closed by marmarek on 2016-02-10 
i wanted to remove okular from my standaloneVM , but when i typed:-
sudo apt-get remove imagemagick
then pressed on y
the entire standealoneVM-debian...
